org.kiji.schema
Interface KijiSystemTable

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
HBaseSystemTable
@ApiAudience.Framework
@ApiStability.Stable
@Inheritance.Sealed
public interface KijiSystemTable
extends Closeable

The Kiji system table, which stores system information such as the version, ready state, and locks.

See Also:
KijiMetaTable, KijiSchemaTable

Method Detail

getDataVersion

ProtocolVersion getDataVersion()
                               throws IOException
Gets the version of kiji installed. This refers to the version of the meta tables and other administrative kiji info installed, not the client code.

Returns:
the version string.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an error.

setDataVersion

void setDataVersion(ProtocolVersion version)
                    throws IOException
Sets the version of kiji installed. This refers to the version of the meta tables and other administrative kiji info installed, not the client code.

Parameters:
version - the version string.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an error.

getSecurityVersion

ProtocolVersion getSecurityVersion()
                                   throws IOException
Gets the version of Kiji security in this instance. The version of Kiji Security installed in this instance restricts the granularity and type of access that may be granted to users.

Returns:
the version string. Version security-0.0 means security is not installed.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an I/O error.

setSecurityVersion

void setSecurityVersion(ProtocolVersion version)
                        throws IOException
Sets the version of Kiji security in this instance. The version of Kiji Security installed in this instance restricts the granularity and type of access that may be granted to users. Only superusers and users with GRANT permission should be able to set the security version. Directly setting the security version may result in inconsistent state in this instance, unless an security version upgrade is performed.

Parameters:
version - the version string.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an I/O error.

                throws IOException
Gets the value associated with a property key.

Parameters:
key - The property key to look up.
Returns:
The value in the system table with the given key, or null if the key is not found.

IOException - If there is an error.

Gets an iterator across all key value pairs in the table.

an iterator of key, value pairs.

toBackup

SystemTableBackup toBackup()
                           throws IOException
Returns key/value backup information in a form that can be directly written to a MetadataBackup record. To read more about the avro try that has been specified to store this info, see Layout.avdl

Returns:
A SystemTableBackup record containing a list of key/value pairs.
Throws:
IOException - in case of an error.

fromBackup

void fromBackup(SystemTableBackup backup)
                throws IOException
Restores the system table entries from the specified backup record.

Parameters:
backup - The system table entries from a MetadataBackup record. Each consists of a key/value pair and a timestamp.
Throws:
IOException - in case of an error.

getKijiURI

KijiURI getKijiURI()
Returns:
The URI of the Kiji instance that this KijiSystemTable serves.
